players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Alice, why did you remain silent? We need everyone to talk to find the mafia."
Bob: "I agree, Alice. Staying silent doesn't help the town. We need to hear from everyone to find patterns."
You: "I will remain silent. I believe that the information I have is crucial and revealing my thoughts could compromise our investigation."
Bob: "Alice, your silence is suspicious. If you had crucial info, you'd share it to help town. Staying quiet only helps the mafia hide. We need to vote out the silent player."
Charlie: "I agree with Bob. Alice, your silence is suspicious and helps the mafia. We need to vote you out to protect the town."
